title: 212. Andy & DJ CTI: Mandatory CRT In College, Dr. Fauci's Contradictions & Gun Ownership Increases Amid LA Crime Wave
itunes:title: 212. Andy & DJ CTI: Mandatory CRT In College, Dr. Fauci's Contradictions & Gun Ownership Increases Amid LA Crime Wave
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss a report that found critical race theory-related ideas mandatory in more than 230 colleges & universities, military documents about the gain of function research contradicting Fauci's testimony under oath, and the purchasing of firearms in LA amid the crime wave.
